fields.name: Defect-Dojo
fields.description: Vulnerability management platform to which Rekono findings will be imported when synchronization is enabled at project level

fields.name: NVD NIST
fields.description: National Vulnerability Database from which Rekono will get CVE information to aggregate findings information

fields.name: HackTricks
fields.description: Wiki that includes an extensive documentation about hacking techniques and tricks, and whose resources will be added as findings references by Rekono

fields.name: CVE Crowd
fields.description: Platform that identifies the most trending CVEs at the moment based on their impact on social networks, and whose API will be used by Rekono to check if the CVEs detected on the targets are trending or not
